name: Choking the Planet
description: Who do we protect?   It's hard to observe and admit unsustainable patterns.  New situations will clearly show the effects of our behavior, and it's the best time to find our reasons and solutions. How to get in different waters  To resist nature, is to witness it's power.   "How Covid-19 (Humanity) is choking the planet.  Three millions masks a minute; Experts now estimate that each month, 129 billion face masks and 65 billion gloves are used and disposed of globally.  Conversationists and non-governmental organisations are increasingly concerned that a lot of the plastic waste, especially pandemic-related waste, is ending up in landfills, waterways and oceans, adding to the millions of tonnes of plastic waste already dumped into the world's oceans every year."  @straits_times https://www.straitstimes.com/multimedia/graphics/2021/01/covid19-masks/index.html?Shell
